message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10000 to you. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a price of $9500 for the product. This offer allows us to strike a fair deal where you receive substantial value while also enabling me to maximize the return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate a successful transaction.
